sentences.english: I will heap mischiefs upon them; I will spend mine arrows upon them.
sentences.chinese: 我要將禍患堆在他們身上，把我的箭向他們射盡。

sentences.english: Good watch prevents misfortune. Forewarned is forearmed.
sentences.chinese: 事先有準備，就可以避免禍患。

sentences.english: A voice is announcing from Dan, proclaiming disaster from the hills of Ephraim.
sentences.chinese: 有聲音從但傳揚，從以法蓮山報禍患。

sentences.english: A danger foresee is half avoided.
I applaud your help and cooperation in fighting the scourge of terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 我讚賞您爲打擊恐怖主義這一禍患提供的幫助與合作。

sentences.english: I will heap calamities upon them and spend my arrows against them.
sentences.chinese: 我要將禍患堆在他們身上，把我的箭向他們射盡。

sentences.english: It had become one of the greatest disasters in modern Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 厘金爲害之烈成爲近代最大的禍患之一。

sentences.english: Misfortune pursues sinners, but prosperity rewards the righteous.
sentences.chinese: 禍患追趕罪人，義人必得善報。

sentences.english: A man who dupes others is able to survive because he is spared at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 不正直的人也能生存，因爲他們僥倖避過禍患罷了。

definition: to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
